itunes:title: Episode 1005 - Will Smith’s Slap Heard Around The World
title: Episode 1005 - Will Smith’s Slap Heard Around The World
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Comedian Tony Casilla joins the show to talk about Will Smith slapping Chris Rock at the Oscars over Rock's joke about the actor's wife, Jada Pinkett-Smith. Plus Casilla explains how he handles hecklers (so that he doesn't get punched in the face) and th...
itunes:summary:
Comedian Tony Casilla joins the show to talk about Will Smith slapping Chris Rock at the Oscars over Rock's joke about the actor's wife, Jada Pinkett-Smith. Plus Casilla explains how he handles hecklers (so that he doesn't get punched in the face) and the guys break down why nice people are terrible presidents.
